features.title2: Let our AI do your job
features.content1: Either choose from our suggested keywords or type your own.
features.content2: It will generate your job post for you to get started.
features.content3: Customize your job post to suit your needs.
features.content4: Share links on other platforms or directly with your candidates.

section2.subtitle: Find Talent
section2.title: What Kind of Candidates Are You Looking for?

banner.subtitle: Why Redrob?
banner.cont1: Creating an hire to deployment takes less
banner.cont2: than 30 seconds. Just give it a try!

job_title.label: Job Title
job_title.placeholder: Add your job post title here

skills.label: Skills
skills.placeholder: Search or select from recommended chips.

visibility.label: Job post visibility
visibility.content: Candidates can only access the link when it's in the 'Open' state.

publish_date.label: Publish date
publish_date.content: Job post will be 'Open' automatically after publish date.

closing_date.label: Closing date
closing_date.content: Job post will be 'Closed' automatically after closing date

createnew.title: Create New Job Post
createnew.leftTitle2: Don't See What You Are Looking For? Type Instead
createnew.rightCont1: Select a job position title from the list and our AI will create skill test questions based on other companies' popular choices.
createnew.rightCont2: If the popular keywords do not suit your needs, you can type your desired job position just like many other companies do!

loading.title: Your Job Post is Being Generated
loading.body: Please wait. It may take up to 60 seconds

open.title: Open Job Post
open.content: Are you sure you want to open this job post? You can close the job post at anytime.

close.title: Close Job Post
close.content: Are you sure you want to close this job post? You can reopen the job post at any time.
